requests.name: Add publication to library
requests.description: Add a publication to the library of a user. Requires authorisation as the owner of that library.

requests.name: Delete a publication
requests.description: Remove publication from the system. Requires authorisation as uploader.
requests.data: {"title": "The viability of the web browser as a computer music platform"}

requests.name: Get user library
requests.description: Load all publications id's of a certain user's library, such as "Portfolio" or "Uploaded".
requests.data: {"title": "The viability of the web browser as a computer music platform"}

requests.name: Adding metadata to the publication
requests.description: Update the metadata of a publication. In this case, only a title is given and the rest in scraped on the server using the 'extract' option in the URL parameters.
requests.data: {"title": "The viability of the web browser as a computer music platform"}

requests.name: Get publication metadata
requests.description: Get the metadata of a publication. Returns JSON.
requests.data: {"title": "The viability of the web browser as a computer music platform"}

requests.name: Download a publication
requests.description: Downloads the original file of the publication.
requests.data: {"title": "The viability of the web browser as a computer music platform"}
